title: My Crazy Sex
resume: A wedding reception hook-up leads to a culinary sex adventure and a sticky situation. A young couple’s sexual adventure proves that you can love nature, but it doesn’t always love you back. A cheating boyfriend drives a furious woman to take grudge sex to new heights.
